summary: Dwemer Themed Home North East Of Rifen For A Rogue Player
descriptionHtml:
[size=+2][color=Red][b]What is it?[/b][/color][/size]
This is a small Dwemer themed home suited towards a rogue character

Made north east of Riften, this Dwemer looking home is made to suit a rogue character.
Hidden up on a hill yet close enough to town this home suits Thieves, Rogues, Nightblades, Assassins or just the lonely traveler.
Including an Alchemy station for your potion and poison needs.
A tanning rack, grindstone and anvil to repair your armor and weapons.
This home has the basic necessities for life.

Also includes a few \"items\" suited towards a rogue.
Although not overpowered these may come in handy, and/or are helpful for role playing purposes.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Requirements?[/b][/color][/size]
Need All Current DLC\'s

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Updates?[/b][/color][/size]
Will be updates for any bugs, and expanding on exterior

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Bugs[/b][/color][/size]
None that are known

[size=+2][color=Red][b]History[/b][/color][/size]

15-7-2013
First Release
